鬜鬜鬜

鬜字的基本解释

鬜
qiān
古同“鬝”。

鬜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》苦閑切，平山，溪。］
［《廣韻》可顔切，平删，溪。］
［《廣韻》恪八切，入黠，溪。］
亦作“鬜1”。
鬓秃。

鬜字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　鬜； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1456第45
【唐韻】苦閑切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】丘閑切，?音慳。【說文】鬢禿也。【註】徐曰：頭鬢少髮也。【韓愈·南山詩】或赤若禿鬜。【註】頭瘡也。　又【廣韻】恪八切【集韻】【韻會】丘八切，?音劼。又【集韻】丘葛切，音渴。又苦八切，音?。又鉏山切，音潺。義?同。又鬝。

鬜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鬜字的起名意思

暂无。

鬜
Basic explanation of words
鬜
qiān
The ancient same as "鬝".
鬜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiān］
["Guangyun" bittersweet cutting, flat mountains, streams. ]
["Guangyun" can be cut, flat deleted, stream. ]
["Guangyun" Ke eight cuts, into the point, the stream. ]
Also known as "鬜1".
Bald temples.
鬜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【髟字部】　鬜; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 1456 to 45
[Tang Yun] bitter and free cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Qiu free cut, sound saving. 【Said the text】Bald temples. [Note] Xu Yue: There is less hair on the head and temples. 【Han Yu·Nanshan Poems】Or red if bald. [Note] Head sores are also.　[Guangyun] Ke Baqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Qiu Baqie,? Yinjie. Also 【Jiyun】Qiu Ge cut, sound thirsty. It's bitter again, the sound?. The mountain cut again, and the sound gurgled. Righteous? Same. Again.
鬜

鬜
Name meaning
Nothing.
qiān
прил. лысый, облысевший; облысение
